CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Initial Contact stage positioned above or below the Contract Signed stage?
SRP.A: The Initial Contact stage is positioned {above} the Contract Signed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Contract Signed?
VE.A: The value of stage Contract Signed is {268}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Lead Captured?
VE.A: The value of stage Lead Captured is {1774}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Lead Captured, with a value of {1774}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Client Onboarded, with a value of {236}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Proposal Sent to stage Negotiation?
SC.A: Decreased by {211} Clients from stage Proposal Sent to stage Negotiation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Lead Captured to stage Initial Contact?
SC.A: Decreased by {561} Clients from stage Lead Captured to stage Initial Contact.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 793? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Lead Captured} stage has {1774}, the {Initial Contact} stage has {1213}, the {Needs Analysis} stage has {918}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 562? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Negotiation} stage has {457}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {268}, the {Client Onboarded} stage has {236}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 562 and 793? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Lead Captured to Initial Contact, or from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Lead Captured} to {Initial Contact} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Lead Captured to Initial Contact, from stage Contract Signed to Client Onboarded, or from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Lead Captured} to stage {Initial Contact} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent, from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, or from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Needs Analysis} to stage {Proposal Sent} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Lead Captured} and {Initial Contact} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Client Onboarded} stages.
